programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this episode of Fifth Gear Tiff Needell and Karun Chandhok take two high performance saloons to the track to discover which is the fastest, and most entertaining, to drive.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff talks to David Coulthard about the new Mercedes SLS AMG, Jason heads to Italy to drive the cutting edge £300,000 Ferrari 599 GTO. Jonny meets up with Vicki for a dogfight between the Land Rover Discovery and brand-new Toyota Land Cruiser.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato and Tiff Needell pit three petrolhead icons against brand new, mainstream cars to find out if the classics we lust after are now outclassed by modern machines.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is in the stunning roads above Nice in the South of France to test the £185,000 Lamborghini Gallardo Performante. Jason Plato tests the Porsche Cayman R.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Jonny face off in the series' first van versus pick-up challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is in Italy testing the most powerful Ferrari ever made, the brand new 730bhp F12berlinetta, to the limit. Tiff and Jason are at the track with the two cheapest hot hatches on sale - the Suzuki Swift and Renault Sport Twingo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The pestilential nuisance of cowboy clamping is now more common than ever. There are no rules or regulations governing the renegade companies that organise these rackets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford and Jonny Smith enter a demolition derby in two unlikely vehicles, Reliant Robins. Tiff Needell tests the latest Porsche 911, the GT3RS. Vicki Butler-Henderson drives the new Vauxhall VXR8.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff tests this grand tourer's handling through the dramatic scenery of Snowdonia in Wales. Jason Plato tests the brand new £115,000 Aston Martin DB9 Volante, one of the fastest cabriolets on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear gets unprecedented access behind the scenes of the multi-million pound Renault Formula 1 team, and the unique competition they recently held to find an engineer of the future.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki takes two Audi TTs to the track for a shoot-out - one has a manual gearbox, the other a semi-automatic - to see which is faster; Jason drives the Bowler Nemesis, a 500 bhp extreme off-roader designed to tackle the world's toughest rallies.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson welcomes Michael Schumacher to the show, for his only British television appearance this year. They go head to head on the track, in a very unusual challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: We find out what happens if you accidentally put diesel into a petrol engine, and follow Tiff Needell as he races an Aston Martin DBR9S.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff races the top of the range £60,000 supercharged Sport cross country against...a horse. Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out exactly how easy it is to control the £160,000 Lamborghini Murcielago.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson jets off to Portugal to drive the new Mazda MX5. It's the best selling sportscar in the world, but have Mazda fixed something that wasn't broken.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tests the latest BMW X5 4.8i. It's an impressive machine - costing £50,000 it'll do 150mph. Jason Palto tests the ultimate track car, the brand new Lotus 2 Eleven.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The most frequently asked motoring question is "What's quickest?" Fifth Gear go to a special test track on the Isle of Anglesey with six of the most desirable performance cars of the moment.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits two almost identical Porsche Caymans. Jonny is enjoying some Spanish sun in the brand new Audi A5 cabriolet. Tim investigates the accuracy of the combined economy cycle. Jason helps Matthew Pinsent find his perfect car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this special episode of the programme we reveal the winners of the Fifth Gear Awards 2006. There will be prizes for Best Small Car, Best Family Car, Best Fast Car and the overall Car of the Year.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out if the new 207 GTi is as exhilarating to drive as the 20 year old hot hatch the 205GTi; Fifth Gear conducts a fascinating world's first crash test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera Jonny goes to meet another pioneer of alternative fuels - a cider farmer who uses rotten apples to produce methane that powers his Jaguar and Tom drives the £260,000 Rolls-Royce Drophead Coupe.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out if an old Daihatsu Charade is the toughest car you can buy; Tom Ford drives the Honda CRV, the SUV that claims to be greener than a MINI Cooper.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Tom Ford test the new Citroen C6 by recreating the President de Gaulle assassination attempt with professional gunmen.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell teams up with supermodel Jodie Kidd to race a Maserati at the Monza grand prix circuit in Italy. Jason Plato visits the Top Marques Monaco Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff take part in another famous Fifth Gear dogfight on Quad Bikes. Jonny attends an auction of DVLA number plates. Vicki tests the Alfa Romeo Mito the new supermini that could finally wipe the smile off the faces of legions of Mini owners

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff pit the new Ford Focus RS against Mitsubishi Evo X. Audi's new Lamborghini engined supercar, the R8 V10, is under scrutiny. Tom Ford examines the brand new Citroen C3 Picasso from the point of view of a truly 21st Century family man.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear guest presenter and Touring Car champion Jason Plato tests Chrysler's new 300C. Is this would-be competitor for the likes of the Mercedes E-class really a car to be taken seriously?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford puts the Bentley Continental Flying Spur to the test. We take the fastest four door saloon in the world on a tour of Britain and see just how many swanky events Tom can visit in 24 hours?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Quentin Willson, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Adrian Simpson visit the British International Motorshow. They look at some of the cars they didn't see at the recent Paris show.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff battle against each other in the purest form of motor-sport: karting. Dirk Benedict joins Jonny Smith in a luxury road test. Tom Ford tests the Renault Laguna - it's rear wheels steer like magic but is it as good as the Mondeo?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff heads to Anglesey to see what's quickest; a Smart Brabus or Mini Cooper S when they get pitched head to head in the Fifth Gear shoot out.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear sees if there is any truth in the old cliches - who are the better drivers, men or women? Can women park? Are men better at map reading? Which is the stronger sex on the race-track?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race two V8 mega-saloons. Tom Ford has the only television test of the charismatic Dodge Challenger. Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out which car is quickest between the Vauxhall Astra Nurburgring and Ford Focus ST.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell sets out to see whether it's possible to drive along the A537 from Macclesfield to Buxton, the most dangerous road in Britain, safely in the first Porsche Cayman in the country.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In a superb world first, Tiff Needell gets to drive a Williams Formula 1 Grand Prix car. With exclusive access to the team we're allowed to follow Tiff every step of the way.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson attempts to drive flat out in Aston Martin's new Vanquish S. The 520bhp, £175,000-plus super-coupe accelerates from 0-60 in 4.8 seconds and is capable of over 200mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Jonny Smith pit two brand new four door supercars head to head at the track - Mercedes CLS63AMG versus Porsche Panamera GTS. Jason heads to the Netherlands to drive what could be the maddest supercar of the year

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Jonny face off in the series' first van versus pick-up challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: A Porsche Boxster races a jet plane; Jason pits the new Audi S8 super saloon against the Audi R8.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear presents some of the best Hot Hatches - those clever cars that neatly combine practicality, performance and affordability - that have featured on the show over the last twenty years.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Jason Plato hold a track battle between two executive cars with over 1000bhp between them. The brand new Audi RS6 and Mercedes E63 AMG are both designed to demolish autobahns
